2
Environmental Monitoring Report
Date Time Window Max Temp (°C) Duration Cause Impact
2025-04-18 12:10–12:20 25.8 10 min HVAC fluctuation Minor
Excursion Description:
On April 18, 2025, temperature exceeded the upper specification limit for 10 minutes during
final filtration. No product compromise was observed. Excursion logged under DEV-003.
QA Review Initials: PD Date: 2025-04-20
Comments:
Excursion was brief and self-correcting. No impact on product quality confirmed via retesting.
Trend Analysis Chart
Temperature Trend (April 15–24, 2025)
• Daily readings plotted against specification range
• One spike observed on April 18
• All other readings within 20–22.5°C
Chart Description:
A line graph shows stable temperature readings across the monitoring period, with a single peak
on April 18 reaching 25.8°C. The spike is isolated and followed by immediate return to baseline.
Root Cause Analysis
Investigation Area Findings
HVAC Logs Temporary sensor lag detected
Operator Activity No deviation from SOP
Equipment Heat Load Normal
Historical Data No prior excursions in this room
Root Cause:
HVAC sensor lag due to delayed feedback loop during peak load.
| Date | Time Window | Max Temp (°C) | Duration | Cause | Impact |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 2025-04-18 | 12:10–12:20 | 25.8 | 10 min | HVAC fluctuation | Minor |

Environmental Monitoring Report

Initiated By: Dr. Leandro Costa

Status: Closed

Action
Preventive Monthly HVAC monitoring added to 2025-04-20 PD
Action SOP
QA Review Comments:
CAPA actions completed and verified. No recurrence observed. Monitoring SOP updated.
Monitoring Summary & Parameters
Parameter Method Specification Status
Temperature Digital Sensor 20–25°C Pass
Humidity Hygrometer 40–60% RH Pass
Particle Count Air Sampler ≤ 100/m³ Pass
Surface Cleanliness Contact Plate Clean Pass
Personnel Hygiene Finger Dab None Pass
Monitoring Summary:
Environmental conditions remained within specification throughout the batch except for one
brief temperature excursion. All corrective actions were implemented. No contamination or
product impact observed.
Final QA Signature: Priya Desai Date: 2025-04-24
